html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-16812017-12-15,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS (Miscellaneous Program) in order to ensure that the start date for the provisions rendering applicable the various provincial enactments in Newfoundland and Labrador reflects the actual operational start date established in the associated administrative agreement between the province and the Government of Canada (January 1, 2018), and clarifies that the provisions are not intended to apply retroactively to offences committed before that date.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0284 Publication Date: 2018-01-10
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
precis: Regulations Amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS (Miscellaneous Program) in order to ensure that the start date for the provisions rendering applicable the various provincial enactments in Newfoundland and Labrador reflects the actual operational start date established in the associated administrative agreement between the province and the Government of Canada (January 1, 2018), and clarifies that the provisions are not intended to apply retroactively to offences committed before that date.
